attributes.action: do somthing about BRITISH Soldiers being discrimanated against just because of what they do for a job.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: BRITISH service personel are being discriminated against because of what they do for a job. I would like to see something done about it. In the U.S.A the troops are loved and are shown appreciation where as here in our home country we are discrinated against.
